wikipedia_page.main: Charles Anthony Peter Duncombe, 6th Baron Feversham (3 January 1945 – 29 March 2009) was a British nobleman and writer.

response: * Peter Duncombe, 6th Baron Feversham (1945–2009), British writer

Feversham is the eldest son of the late Peter Duncombe, 6th Baron Feversham, and was educated at Gordonstoun with Prince Edward.  After serving three years in prison for attempted robbery while high on cocaine, he founded the pornographic film companies Tongue in Cheek and Relish XXX, the latter of which sells titles to National Health Service fertility clinics and sperm banks.  They also install vending machines with VHS cassettes and DVDs in pub bathrooms.
